DMCfun
======

# Available modules


The overview below shows which DMCfun installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using DMCfun, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load DMCfun/1.3.0-foss-2019b-R-3.6.2
```
